width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;952&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"952\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cb8d22873e4623880bc125b8a177237c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-cb8d22873e4623880bc125b8a177237c_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>Source: Photo@摄图网</figcaption></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>在<b>无需钓鱼证！！！</b>的南澳州，<b>最省钱（不用专业渔具与潜水设备），最适合“技术小白”与带娃家庭的“亲抓美味”方式，挖蛤蛎与抓螃蟹绝对稳居榜首！</b></p><h2>南澳蛤蛎篇</h2><p>蛤蜊(PIPI)营养丰富，酒蒸、清炒、意面，再配上一杯南澳美酒，单是想象都让人直流口水！！！但在很久以前，蛤蜊却仅被澳洲人用作鱼饵，白白浪费了这物美价廉的“天下第一鲜”。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-52d71d919ae8cc3d69b31cc9944d919a_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-52d71d919ae8cc3d69b31cc9944d919a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-52d71d919ae8cc3d69b31cc9944d919a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-52d71d919ae8cc3d69b31cc9944d919a_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>Source: Photo@Taste</figcaption></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>而如今，拾蛤蛎(Cockling)成为了盛夏南澳家庭亲子游的一大热门项目。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b987d706541cee39d62be4eaaa9e413e_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b987d706541cee39d62be4eaaa9e413e_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b987d706541cee39d62be4eaaa9e413e_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b987d706541cee39d62be4eaaa9e413e_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>Source: Photo@Ian Routledge/SATC</figcaption></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>抓捕时间：每年11月1日至次年5月31日</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-758513f6a702ae421c686d22378a4fdd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-758513f6a702ae421c686d22378a4fdd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-758513f6a702ae421c686d22378a4fdd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-758513f6a702ae421c686d22378a4fdd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>最佳挖蛤蛎地点：</b>古华海滩(Goolwa Beach)自墨累河口(Murray Mouth)延伸至米德尔顿角(Middleton Point)的浅海沙滩，市区驱车向南约1小时15分钟车程。</p><h2><b>装备与规定：</b></h2><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4f93f8fc2e52a4eef49c9c03e5d7875a_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"664\" data-rawheight=\"869\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"664\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4f93f8fc2e52a4eef49c9c03e5d7875a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;664&#39; height=&#39;869&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"664\" data-rawheight=\"869\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"664\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4f93f8fc2e52a4eef49c9c03e5d7875a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-4f93f8fc2e52a4eef49c9c03e5d7875a_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>1.<b>蛤蛎尺（售价5澳元左右）</b>——可从古华地区的加油站、渔具店购买。装入桶前，记得先用蛤蛎尺测量确保，贝壳最宽处的直径若小于3.5厘米，请给蛤蛎宝宝留一条生路！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5501499c66f461ab5c8893eb5d42f355_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5501499c66f461ab5c8893eb5d42f355_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5501499c66f461ab5c8893eb5d42f355_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-5501499c66f461ab5c8893eb5d42f355_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>Source: Photo@Traveller</figcaption></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ae207b8ebbe3ca7482680da047a31725_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ae207b8ebbe3ca7482680da047a31725_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ae207b8ebbe3ca7482680da047a31725_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-ae207b8ebbe3ca7482680da047a31725_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2.<b>手套、铲子或蛤蛎网(Cockle net)</b>——涨潮的时候，蛤蛎被冲上海滩，撵着落潮的时候，带着手套或用铲子在沙下5-15公分轻轻一挖，或是直接上网兜，就是白花花的美味了，当然，高兴之余心里也得有个数，别一不小心超量被罚款*，反而得不偿失！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8114277c1c3fc4fc831d320f9016f008_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1242\" data-rawheight=\"2851\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1242\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8114277c1c3fc4fc831d320f9016f008_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1242&#39; height=&#39;2851&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1242\" data-rawheight=\"2851\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1242\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8114277c1c3fc4fc831d320f9016f008_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8114277c1c3fc4fc831d320f9016f008_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>3.水桶与保温箱(Esky)——挖到的蛤蛎记得与海水一同装入Esky中，用一天的时间，让蛤蛎吐尽沙子，方可享受美味。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1c4e61336c0af8cca85eac860a6bfe47_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2713\" data-rawheight=\"1084\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2713\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1c4e61336c0af8cca85eac860a6bfe47_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2713&#39; height=&#39;1084&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2713\" data-rawheight=\"1084\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2713\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1c4e61336c0af8cca85eac860a6bfe47_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1c4e61336c0af8cca85eac860a6bfe47_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4.墨镜、太阳帽、防晒霜与水——防暑与防晒的重要性，体验过澳洲盛夏烈阳的人都懂的！</p><p><i>*特别提醒：荣鹏赫半岛(Younghusband Peninsula)的库容海滩(Coorong Beach)由Murray Mouth至28 Mile Crossing的区域是保护区，严禁休闲渔业人士入内，小伙伴们别行差踏错哦！</i></p><p>更多休闲捕捞的规定与潮汐资讯可参看官网：<a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//www.pir.sa.gov.au/fishing/recreational_fishing\" class=\" external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\"><span class=\"invisible\">http://www.</span><span class=\"visible\">pir.sa.gov.au/fishing/r</span><span class=\"invisible\">ecreational_fishing</span><span class=\"ellipsis\"></span></a> ；或从苹果或谷歌应用商店下载免费的南澳休闲捕捞指南(SA Recreational Fishing Guide) APP。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31db6a998f9e0b6691aeddfb4a1f46df_b.png\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"714\" data-rawheight=\"659\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"714\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31db6a998f9e0b6691aeddfb4a1f46df_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;714&#39; height=&#39;659&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"714\" data-rawheight=\"659\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"714\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31db6a998f9e0b6691aeddfb4a1f46df_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-31db6a998f9e0b6691aeddfb4a1f46df_b.png\"/></figure><p>若你以为来一趟古华就挖个蛤蜊，那你可就白瞎了这些美丽的风景与丰富的活动了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4190d71991e1358156ef0e19c5a4d9a1_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"670\" data-rawheight=\"930\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"670\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4190d71991e1358156ef0e19c5a4d9a1_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;670&#39; height=&#39;930&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"670\" data-rawheight=\"930\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"670\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4190d71991e1358156ef0e19c5a4d9a1_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4190d71991e1358156ef0e19c5a4d9a1_b.jpg\"/></figure><a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//www.uwai.com/article/goolwa-1003\" data-draft-node=\"block\" data-draft-type=\"link-card\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">垂钓、观鸟、水上休闲的轻城慢生活 | Goolwa</a><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>趁着天高云淡的周末圣诞假期，赶紧提上水桶，带上孩子，规划个古华一日游，好吃好玩更有得拿！</p><h2>南澳🦀篇</h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-113bf08202dc28013259c2c90d32c986_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2273\" data-rawheight=\"904\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2273\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-113bf08202dc28013259c2c90d32c986_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2273&#39; height=&#39;904&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2273\" data-rawheight=\"904\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2273\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-113bf08202dc28013259c2c90d32c986_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-113bf08202dc28013259c2c90d32c986_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>种类：沙蟹（左）与蓝蟹（右，更肥美）</b></p><p><b>抓捕时间：每年十月至次年4月，尤以秋末夏初时节为胜</b></p><p><b>最佳网钓螃蟹的地点：</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-902eeeda4a9be8cc44cc49e7466a11b2_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-902eeeda4a9be8cc44cc49e7466a11b2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-902eeeda4a9be8cc44cc49e7466a11b2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-902eeeda4a9be8cc44cc49e7466a11b2_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>Source: Photo@Tom&amp;#39;s Fishin&amp;#39; Adventures</figcaption></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>南澳州能够钓螃蟹的海滩真不少，单是市区车程半小时以内的，就有布莱顿海滩(Brighton Beach)、亨利海滩(Henley Beach)、格兰奇海滩(Grange Beach)与撒马佛海滩(Semaphore Beach)。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2ef34bbf40a47f8a9c6b1b8ba64a3c07_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2ef34bbf40a47f8a9c6b1b8ba64a3c07_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2ef34bbf40a47f8a9c6b1b8ba64a3c07_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2ef34bbf40a47f8a9c6b1b8ba64a3c07_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>Source: Photo@Adam Bruzzone/Traveller</figcaption></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>若想找一些人少鲜货多，可度假的海滩，那被斯宾塞湾(Spencer Gulf)与圣文森特海湾(Gulf St Vincent)环绕的约克半岛(Yorke Peninsula)是首选。</p><p><b>最佳耙螃蟹的地点：</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b86a8e5356bcbddd25dfc146110af32_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b86a8e5356bcbddd25dfc146110af32_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b86a8e5356bcbddd25dfc146110af32_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-8b86a8e5356bcbddd25dfc146110af32_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>Source: Photo@Adventures of Munch</figcaption></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-29d9ffd28553a528fb40eefc328f1490_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"651\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-29d9ffd28553a528fb40eefc328f1490_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;651&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"651\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-29d9ffd28553a528fb40eefc328f1490_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-29d9ffd28553a528fb40eefc328f1490_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>Source: Photo@Journey Era</figcaption></figure><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5e1ad9f8cb1cea40ccf1b620088bdc8_b.png\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1155\" data-rawheight=\"705\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1155\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5e1ad9f8cb1cea40ccf1b620088bdc8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1155&#39; height=&#39;705&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1155\" data-rawheight=\"705\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1155\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5e1ad9f8cb1cea40ccf1b620088bdc8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f5e1ad9f8cb1cea40ccf1b620088bdc8_b.png\"/></figure><p>汤普森海滩(Thompson Beach)是最著名的耙螃蟹胜地，距离市区西北向约1小时左右车程；途中行经的高勒港(Port Gawler)虽然更小众些，但同样可以获得丰收。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>装备与规定：</b></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f85a020aaf70190bd3685c9666f5dbec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"335\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f85a020aaf70190bd3685c9666f5dbec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;640&#39; height=&#39;335&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"640\" data-rawheight=\"335\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"640\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f85a020aaf70190bd3685c9666f5dbec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f85a020aaf70190bd3685c9666f5dbec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><ol><li><b>*蟹尺（4-8澳元）</b>——蟹壳最宽处直径小于11厘米的要记得放生哦！</li></ol><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0dad942330b56bd93a82023dbc6ced3d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1145\" data-rawheight=\"4096\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1145\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0dad942330b56bd93a82023dbc6ced3d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1145&#39; height=&#39;4096&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1145\" data-rawheight=\"4096\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1145\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0dad942330b56bd93a82023dbc6ced3d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-0dad942330b56bd93a82023dbc6ced3d_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>2. *蟹耙或符合标准的钓网（直径最长107厘米，最深92厘米的环网或/和吊网，约10澳元上下）+ 延长尼龙绳</b>——要留意的是，撒网有数量限制，不是多多益善！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>3. 钓饵</b>——钓螃蟹的时候，任何鱼类诱饵（常用鲑鱼、鲱鱼、鲭鱼、沙丁鱼）都行，但使用动物的骨头、皮肉是被禁止的，所以鸡骨架可千万别再用了。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1e1da9e9ad9e1c0103dcef5c1b918d33_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1e1da9e9ad9e1c0103dcef5c1b918d33_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1000&#39; height=&#39;667&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1000\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1000\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1e1da9e9ad9e1c0103dcef5c1b918d33_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1e1da9e9ad9e1c0103dcef5c1b918d33_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>Source: Photo@Journey Era</figcaption></figure><p><b>4. 厚手套与胶鞋</b>——你大约不会想要挑战螃蟹的大螯，若是耙蟹，最好手套胶鞋（或全裹脚的鞋）齐上阵，若是钓蟹，有副手套也会让你在上上下下拉网的时候不致于磨破手。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>5. <b>水桶与保温箱(Esky)</b>——要想螃蟹活得久一些，别忘了用海水或泥浆养着，放Esky 的时候再加些从加油站买的冰，“冰鲜”效果更好。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>6. <b>墨镜、太阳帽、防晒霜与水</b>——理由你懂得！</p><p><i>*这些装备在Big W与K-Mart以及渔具店都有卖</i></p><p>小贴士：</p><ul><li>出发前更新 GPS，沿着GPS 标识的大路走，别想着抄捷径走小路，一个不小心，陷车、迷路都是小事，没准还会被渔业巡逻官当成非法捕捞者。</li><li>设网可置于不同的深度（海面下水深4-6米处），每15-20分钟检查一下，拉网的时候尽量顺风顺流比较省力，一旦网里有货，记得使出吃奶的劲快拉，别给螃蟹开溜的机会。</li><li>用蟹耙要有耐心，沿着海草缓缓拖过沙地，尽量不要破坏海草床。</li><li>耙蟹要留意潮汐，撵着落潮容易找，但别兴奋过头，走得太深，不然回头怕是会有很长一段泥泞要奋斗。更多资讯与耙蟹技巧视频可参看<a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//www.thompsonbeach.info/crabbing-fishing-tides/\" class=\" external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\"><span class=\"invisible\">https://www.</span><span class=\"visible\">thompsonbeach.info/crab</span><span class=\"invisible\">bing-fishing-tides/</span><span class=\"ellipsis\"></span></a></li></ul><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5e1b6082f80631f3cf1a7d49688e58c0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"665\" data-rawheight=\"665\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"665\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5e1b6082f80631f3cf1a7d49688e58c0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;665&#39; height=&#39;665&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"665\" data-rawheight=\"665\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"665\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5e1b6082f80631f3cf1a7d49688e58c0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-5e1b6082f80631f3cf1a7d49688e58c0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>对了，“网红”摄影佳所粉湖(Lake Bumbunga)与著名的“红酒之都”芭萝莎谷(Barossa Valley)，距离高勒港与汤普森海滩都仅有1小时左右的车程，若时间充裕，何不来一趟“摄影亲子游”或“美酒海鲜游”？</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c3e1b775d44a143ce32f3faaec2ac4b3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1600\" data-rawheight=\"1066\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1600\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c3e1b775d44a143ce32f3faaec2ac4b3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1600&#39; height=&#39;1066&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1600\" data-rawheight=\"1066\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1600\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c3e1b775d44a143ce32f3faaec2ac4b3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c3e1b775d44a143ce32f3faaec2ac4b3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><i>本文中的图片选自南澳旅游局媒体库、摄图网、商家（或活动主办方）官网/Fackbook/Instagram，与谷歌（如涉及版权，请联络 UWAI 协商删除）。本文中若有涉及产品、价格之资讯，仅供参考，请以官网最新资讯为准，且商家（或活动主办方）拥有对上述涉及事项的最终解释权。凡注明来源“游外原创”或“游外编辑部综合整理”的文章，系“游外”所有之独家稿件，版权属于“游外”，未经“游外”授权，不得转载、摘编或利用其他方式使用上述作品；违反上述声明者，“游外”将保留追求其相关法律责任的权利；若第三方获得授权转载时，请注明“原文出自游外（UWAI）”。凡注明来源“ XXX（非游外原创或游外编辑部综合整理）”的文章，均转载自其他媒体，旨在于传播更多信息，并不代表“游外”赞同其观点并对其真实性负责。</i></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><i>原文来源：游外（UWAI）</i></p><a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//www.uwai.com/article/cockling-and-crabbing-in-sa-1057\" data-draft-node=\"block\" data-draft-type=\"link-card\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">挖蛤蛎、抓螃蟹？还你一个纯净的童年野趣时光！</a><p></p>",

width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;720&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"720\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-43262a3456d876dcfd6a1ed5970494a4_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-43262a3456d876dcfd6a1ed5970494a4_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>沉没或者游泳，你选哪个？（Source: Photo@Take 2 Photography/Wenn.com）</figcaption></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>0 2 澳洲国庆日蟑螂赛跑节 Australia Day Cockroach Races</b></h2><p>举办时间：2019年1月26日</p><p>节日网站：<u><a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//www.cockroachraces.com.au/\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">www.cockroachraces.com.au</a></u></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>据说，蟑螂不到1秒的时间可完成100码的冲刺！而全球个头最大的蟑螂在昆士兰！于是，1982年，两个酒吧客吹嘘自家地区的蟑螂并干脆厮杀了一场。没想到，一下子赛出了名堂。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e89a6dfa2f5605dbd8358c8f1716a494_b.png\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"500\" data-rawheight=\"334\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"500\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e89a6dfa2f5605dbd8358c8f1716a494_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1204&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1204\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-692426fc1f654d6d0f2b1e1f98c6aff3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-692426fc1f654d6d0f2b1e1f98c6aff3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>不在上面的表格里！每月百元的保险费可以省下了？</p><p>别光想着省小钱，高兴得太早！</p><p>一旦你在澳洲有个头疼脑热，或是逢上意外，</p><p>国民医疗保险（Medicare）没你的份，</p><p>又少了私人医疗保险加持，</p><p><b>扫个 X-光100刀，拔颗智齿250刀，叫辆救护车800刀，</b></p><p>若再算上住院与药费的开销，</p><p>就等着每日成百上千澳元地破财吧！</p><p>万一再把病情给耽搁了，更得不偿失！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>下面就是个例子</p><p>▼</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c194b53a1b33dc42e7b52abc4aa76468_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"657\" data-rawheight=\"671\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"657\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c194b53a1b33dc42e7b52abc4aa76468_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;498&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"498\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61417a0d0f1c722356a666c1cfc137b0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-61417a0d0f1c722356a666c1cfc137b0_b.jpg\"/></figure><ul><li><b>Bupa</b></li><li><b>Medibank</b></li><li><b>AHM（访客保险参考Medibank）</b></li><li><b>Allianz</b></li><li><b>NIB（访客保险参考IMAN Australian）</b></li></ul><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>简单来讲，三个考虑因素：</b></p><p><b>1. 希望更实惠？</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9fa1c9aad8cf0f759eeaa437aecfcc23_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"487\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9fa1c9aad8cf0f759eeaa437aecfcc23_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;487&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"487\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9fa1c9aad8cf0f759eeaa437aecfcc23_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9fa1c9aad8cf0f759eeaa437aecfcc23_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>同等保险费与险种级别下，选择保障项目更广，可报销额度更高的，反之，选择价格更便宜的，例如同为基本险，Bupa 有年龄划分，50岁及以上的月费较Allianz，每月要高出约30澳元，但50岁以下的月费较之Allianz反要便宜约65澳元*（*有垫底费）。<br/></p><p><b>2. 希望报销的方式更便利？</b></p><p>选择合作/签约医疗服务网络更广的，例如Bupa, Medibank。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>3. 有语言局限？</b></p><p>选择网站提供中文资讯或支持中文咨询的，例如 Allianz, Bupa（有微信服务与中文热线 1300 368 623）。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>此外，一些私保公司（如 Bupa）会为会员提供独享的健康与生活优惠，如电影票或健身卡折扣之类；一些私保公司（如AHM, Allianz）提供暂时中止保险缴费，已缴保险费用延期，提前离境退还保险费余额等不同的通融性条例，额外的“省钱红利”就看你会不会利用啦！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>伤脑筋③  买哪种类型的保险？</b></h2><p><b>答：各保险公司的实际项目名称会略有不同，但大体可分为基本险（如 Basic 或 Essential）与中级/高级险（如Essential Plus, Platinum, Mid, Top等）。</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8371477efee9914cd7a87050a966c5f8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"3022\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8371477efee9914cd7a87050a966c5f8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;3022&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"3022\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8371477efee9914cd7a87050a966c5f8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8371477efee9914cd7a87050a966c5f8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>伤脑筋④  明明已有医疗保险，看GP 为啥还要再掏钱？</b></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>答：你需要确认两点：</b></p><p><b>1. 你的保险是否有覆盖全科医生（GP）服务？</b></p><p>例如，Allianz、NIB的海外访客经济型医疗保险（Budget-Hospital only）虽便宜，却不覆盖该服务。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fa735f11ddc81505a5158b2711753955_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"638\" data-rawheight=\"820\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"638\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fa735f11ddc81505a5158b2711753955_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;638&#39; height=&#39;820&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"638\" data-rawheight=\"820\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"638\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fa735f11ddc81505a5158b2711753955_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fa735f11ddc81505a5158b2711753955_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>2. 你的全科医生是否为100%汇总计费(100% Bulking-billing)*？</b></p><p>即医生接受医疗保险福利计划中的医疗服务报销标准作为所提供服务的全款，就医者无须再支付差额，只需划卡签单。</p><p>*推荐一个支持查找Bulking-billing GP 的网站：1800bulkbill.com.au。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb4c972ec4f8e11f8c8692a728a8665d_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"744\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb4c972ec4f8e11f8c8692a728a8665d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;744&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"744\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb4c972ec4f8e11f8c8692a728a8665d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fb4c972ec4f8e11f8c8692a728a8665d_b.jpg\"/></figure><h2><b>上面两个回答都为“是”！</b></h2><p><b>恭喜，你看全科医生可以不用再出血啦！</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>伤脑筋⑤  想尽快拿到报销费用该怎么做？</b></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>答：</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a99e9e04711f2459b9dbd064eeb8a758_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"2320\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a99e9e04711f2459b9dbd064eeb8a758_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;2320&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"2320\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a99e9e04711f2459b9dbd064eeb8a758_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-a99e9e04711f2459b9dbd064eeb8a758_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><i>文章内容中涉及的资料参考：</i></p><p><i><u><a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//www.privatehealth.gov.au/\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">www.privatehealth.gov.au</a></u>,</i> <i><u><a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//www.health-insurance-overseas.com/\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">www.health-insurance-overseas.com</a></u></i> </p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>原文来源：游外（UWAI）</p><a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//www.uwai.com/article/ovhc-n-oshc-health-insurance-1060\" data-draft-node=\"block\" data-draft-type=\"link-card\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">海外旅居想省保险费？进趟医院让你丢掉“半个房”！</a><p></p>",

width=&#39;850&#39; height=&#39;455&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"850\" data-rawheight=\"455\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"850\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-43282f3ba1966053132d5bf5cbbe5f7f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-43282f3ba1966053132d5bf5cbbe5f7f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>阿德莱德山地区的每一个小镇，斯特灵(Stirling)、奥尔德盖特(Aldgate)、克拉佛斯(Crafers)......都有着与汉多夫小镇不相上下的美，斯特灵更是自百年前，即被无数挑剔生活品质的达官贵人择为度假胜地。</b>与其住在千篇一律的现代派都市大酒店/汽车旅馆，将时间耗费在来来往往的路程上；何不索性住在阿德莱德山，彻彻底底融入如欧洲田园山林般的氛围中，好好探索这一片仙境！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45e8bceca05949ae3874a8d42a4d9728_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"658\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45e8bceca05949ae3874a8d42a4d9728_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;658&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"658\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45e8bceca05949ae3874a8d42a4d9728_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-45e8bceca05949ae3874a8d42a4d9728_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>虽然，如小编这样囊中较为羞涩的旅行者，桑格罗夫庄园酒店大约只属于未来某一天的金婚纪念日；但并不代表，如今的我不可以享受同样的自然人文环境。<b>今天要安利的是克拉佛斯小屋(Crafers Cottages)下辖的，位于阿德莱德山的自助式、家庭与宠物友好型小别墅，各有各的韵味，适合不同旅行风格的人。</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>内心体验型：樱桃树小屋(Cherrytree Cottage)</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0e196708c1c92897068207f0cafa10d0_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"664\" data-rawheight=\"498\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"664\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0e196708c1c92897068207f0cafa10d0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;664&#39; height=&#39;498&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"664\" data-rawheight=\"498\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"664\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0e196708c1c92897068207f0cafa10d0_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-0e196708c1c92897068207f0cafa10d0_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>樱桃树小屋同位于克拉佛斯小镇，是一栋坐落在茂密树林中的单间公寓式静居——木质装饰，温暖的格调，70年代复古风格的卫浴与家具。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8cedf3f1f4f8435f156a6a75ca6b48ec_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1004\" data-rawheight=\"500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1004\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8cedf3f1f4f8435f156a6a75ca6b48ec_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1004&#39; height=&#39;500&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1004\" data-rawheight=\"500\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1004\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8cedf3f1f4f8435f156a6a75ca6b48ec_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-8cedf3f1f4f8435f156a6a75ca6b48ec_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>躺在松软的豪华特大床里，捧一本书，看巨大的窗外春花绽放，秋叶飘零，或是在露台上捧一杯咖啡小憩，“充电完毕”，会让你更有精力探索周边的酒庄、植物园和画廊。</p><p>*$180澳元/每晚（一对夫妻/情侣，最少2晚起住，少于2晚有附加费用产生）</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>Crafers Cottages - Cherrytree Cottage</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2fd122e77c1a74e89d264c3717a141d3_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2fd122e77c1a74e89d264c3717a141d3_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;1080&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"1080\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2fd122e77c1a74e89d264c3717a141d3_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2fd122e77c1a74e89d264c3717a141d3_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>人文历史型：斯特灵度假别墅(Stirling House)</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-68efc825f4af65a2d8714631b5cb0313_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"666\" data-rawheight=\"501\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"666\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-68efc825f4af65a2d8714631b5cb0313_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;             "title": "轻松澳洲“游客退税计划”攻略", 
            "content": "<p>除非你是看不上为了一点小钱而浪费时间排队的“土豪金”；绝大部分的小伙伴们，在澳洲血拼购物后，都希望利用澳洲“游客退税计划”(Tourist Refund Scheme, TRS)，在机场“争分夺秒”地申请退还商品及服务税(GST)和/或酒类均衡税(WET)。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1e2d98f517cced6349874b6ceb43704_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"656\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1e2d98f517cced6349874b6ceb43704_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;960&#39; height=&#39;656&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"960\" data-rawheight=\"656\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"960\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1e2d98f517cced6349874b6ceb43704_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-d1e2d98f517cced6349874b6ceb43704_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>(Source@ausbt)</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>别小看你购物发票上的 GST和/或WET，综合算一算，那可是成百上千的“软妹币”，最少也能多出再买一支茱莉蔻护手霜自用，或是给娃捎上一罐奶粉的钱，多的话，一个 iPad 的钱都能省出来！</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1fbd5427f7d8a40835658e496bf0f9cf_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"746\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1fbd5427f7d8a40835658e496bf0f9cf_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;746&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"746\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1fbd5427f7d8a40835658e496bf0f9cf_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-1fbd5427f7d8a40835658e496bf0f9cf_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>（Source@摄图网）</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>当然，要享受澳洲政府给予海外游客与澳洲居民（航空/航海在职人员除外）的这个“福利”，自然先得弄清楚它是什么？有什么样的条件？如何申请？</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-aa1f08292a1f78c44ce73977d7d36903_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-aa1f08292a1f78c44ce73977d7d36903_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;667&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"667\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-aa1f08292a1f78c44ce73977d7d36903_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-aa1f08292a1f78c44ce73977d7d36903_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>想了解与 TRS 相关的所有官方资讯，大大缩短机场退税的排队时间，且省得“鸡同鸭讲”浪费口水，<b>最简单的办法就是：提前从苹果商店 或 谷歌商店下载免费的 “游客退税计划”手机 APP（如图），里面的“信息”页面基本含括了你的所有疑问。</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-21b25018dc2cf8887dedf6be803b9f9c_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"663\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-21b25018dc2cf8887dedf6be803b9f9c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;663&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"663\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-21b25018dc2cf8887dedf6be803b9f9c_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-21b25018dc2cf8887dedf6be803b9f9c_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>若你“太忙了”，或“懒得”一条一条细看，那下方的精华总结与步骤图会为你省下不少时间与精力。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>精华总结</b></p><p><b>Q：申请退税要提前多久到TRS 柜台（或边检署客户服务台）？需携带哪些？</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cd0b7c326030738a1922296e486bc25_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"527\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cd0b7c326030738a1922296e486bc25_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;527&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"527\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cd0b7c326030738a1922296e486bc25_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7cd0b7c326030738a1922296e486bc25_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>阿德莱德机场 TRS 退税边检署客户服务台(Source@游外)</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>A：<b>航班预定起飞时间90分钟内，30分钟前</b>（如从悉尼、墨尔本等大机场出境则请提前120分钟）；<b>邮轮离港4小时内，1小时前。</b></p><ul><li>TRS 申请二维码（如使用 APP）；</li><li>所有符合退税条件的已购商品和对应的正规税务发票（请务必妥善保管）；</li><li>护照与出境航班登机牌。</li></ul><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>Q：哪些商品符合退税条件？</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-11ccf368fb9bfd549f712f68a11c7131_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"512\" data-rawheight=\"690\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"512\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-11ccf368fb9bfd549f712f68a11c7131_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;512&#39; height=&#39;690&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"512\" data-rawheight=\"690\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"512\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-11ccf368fb9bfd549f712f68a11c7131_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-11ccf368fb9bfd549f712f68a11c7131_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>A：请参考上图</p><p><i>注：单张发票金额在1000澳元以上，须注明购买人身份资料（名字、地址、电邮或护照号）。</i></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>Q:哪些商品不符合退税条件？</b></p><p>A：</p><ul><li>啤酒、烈酒或烟草产品；</li><li>已免GST/WET或GST/WET为“0”的商品（如药品、某些食品）；</li><li>住宿、租车、旅游等服务；</li><li>礼品卡或消费券；</li><li>在澳洲境内已消费或部分消费的商品（如食品、香水等），电子产品和服饰等不计（请保留原有商品标签）。</li></ul><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>Q:哪些退税商品需要托运？手续有无不同？</b></p><p>A：若退税商品为液体、喷雾、胶状或尺寸超额，需要先由边检署客户服务台官员查看，并在发票上盖章后，方可办理托运；到 TRS 柜台后，需出示盖了章的发票。</p><p><i>注：贵重物品（如名包名表、珠宝首饰、手机、平板、电脑、相机等）需要退税，请随身穿戴或作为手提行李携带。</i></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>Q:我的退税金额是多少？何时可收到？</b></p><p>A：GST=商品金额÷11*WET=酒类商品总价的14.5%*<i>注：正规税务发票(Tax Invoice)上会注明每件商品是否已征收 GST 或 WET（单独列出金额，或写明 GST/WET  Inclusive），没有标明则表示不含；所以购买商品时请记得索取。</i></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17be2e1d84894755597eff61ffc559b2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"720\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17be2e1d84894755597eff61ffc559b2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;720&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"720\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17be2e1d84894755597eff61ffc559b2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-17be2e1d84894755597eff61ffc559b2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>(Source@摄图网)</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>不支付现金！！！</b></p><p>选择“信用卡”或“澳洲银行账户”的方式60天内可到账，选择“支票”的方式最多两月可寄达。</p><p><i>注：想要早一点拿到退税款，信用卡最为方便。</i></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><u><a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//www.homeaffairs.gov.au/trav/ente/tour/are-you-a-traveller\" class=\" wrap external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\">详情查询请点击登录TRS官网</a></u></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>简单五步搞定退税二维码</b></p><p>第一步 打开APP，接受软件使用条件和条款，登录主界面，阅读“信息”页面【不想一条一条细看的就去扫一眼“精华总结吧”】。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c7dd5fef436d3d41ef0d66c01b253fc8_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"670\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c7dd5fef436d3d41ef0d66c01b253fc8_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;670&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"670\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c7dd5fef436d3d41ef0d66c01b253fc8_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-c7dd5fef436d3d41ef0d66c01b253fc8_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第二步 点击‘我的旅行详情’，非澳大利亚或新西兰护照请一律勾选“其他”，输入护照号码，选择是否为澳大利亚居民【除海外短期访客外，公民、PR、留学生等均属于“居民”范畴】，以及离境日期。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-620a3f6cadeed3671dd9bb64e1d5c5df_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"2024\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-620a3f6cadeed3671dd9bb64e1d5c5df_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;2024&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"2024\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-620a3f6cadeed3671dd9bb64e1d5c5df_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-620a3f6cadeed3671dd9bb64e1d5c5df_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第三步 点击‘我的发票’，再点击右上角“+”输入发票详情，含 ABN，发票号码（有就填）与发票日期。点击“我的发票项目”选择申请退税商品的类别与含税后的总金额；可添加多张发票。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e527163aa075139f27dc1b323d0939fd_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"614\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e527163aa075139f27dc1b323d0939fd_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;614&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"614\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e527163aa075139f27dc1b323d0939fd_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e527163aa075139f27dc1b323d0939fd_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>澳洲正规税务发票示例</b></p><p>▼</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-da819cad06cf8bb222d1ed8dc8b0d62f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"945\" data-rawheight=\"2119\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"945\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-da819cad06cf8bb222d1ed8dc8b0d62f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;945&#39; height=&#39;2119&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"945\" data-rawheight=\"2119\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"945\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-da819cad06cf8bb222d1ed8dc8b0d62f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-da819cad06cf8bb222d1ed8dc8b0d62f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第四步 点击‘我的付款详情’，选择退税付款方式，信用卡，澳大利亚银行账户或支票【目前退税支票币种不支持人民币与台币】。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a39e80ce0d0179c2c4122d6e500f571_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"499\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a39e80ce0d0179c2c4122d6e500f571_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;499&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"499\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a39e80ce0d0179c2c4122d6e500f571_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4a39e80ce0d0179c2c4122d6e500f571_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>第五步 以上全部完成后，点击‘出示我的申请’，并勾选“我同意”。程序会生成一个QR二维码（请妥善保存，截图、打印或存入手机等电子设备中皆可）。</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-53f385e213e805e497ac5b9aca48db21_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"622\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-53f385e213e805e497ac5b9aca48db21_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;722&#39; height=&#39;740&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"722\" data-rawheight=\"740\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"722\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b15f27c49161fcaf3d541e1874dd8795_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-b15f27c49161fcaf3d541e1874dd8795_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>的确，在澳大利亚的广袤海域，生活着箱型水母(Box Jellyfish)、伊鲁康吉水母(Irukandji Jellyfish)、白真鲨(Bull Shark)、盐水鳄(Salt Water Crocodile)、蓝环章鱼（Blue Ringed Octopus）五大致命海洋/河流生物。<b>但除蓝环章鱼外，大都集中在热带海域/河流域（昆士兰州、北领地、新南威尔士州与西澳大利亚州的海域）。</b></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-49f64891d647be9b664a16f5a086a09b_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"628\" data-rawheight=\"4096\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"628\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-49f64891d647be9b664a16f5a086a09b_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;628&#39; height=&#39;4096&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"628\" data-rawheight=\"4096\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"628\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-49f64891d647be9b664a16f5a086a09b_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-49f64891d647be9b664a16f5a086a09b_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>蓝环章鱼相对胆小，在“不被主动挑衅”的情况下，更倾向于退缩，主动侵略攻击性不强。虽然，其毒素会导致自发性肌肉瘫痪，进而造成缺氧窒息，但人工呼吸救助能有助于患者康复，故而，仅在1950至60年代导致过两起致命事故。南澳的小伙伴们可以放心出游！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>当然，若你初来乍到，对这里的海滩不太熟悉，那不妨参考下面的这些通用小贴士，度过一个更安全愉快的海滩之行。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><h2><b>澳洲海滩出行小贴士</b></h2><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f4384df380df5977113a0bb3ab8568f_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"608\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f4384df380df5977113a0bb3ab8568f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;608&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"608\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f4384df380df5977113a0bb3ab8568f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9f4384df380df5977113a0bb3ab8568f_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>来源：图片@sls.com.au</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>1. 确保在有红黄旗帜标记的海滩区间游泳或冲浪，这些海滩区间夏季常驻有水上救生员，下载“Beachsafe App”可搜索到距离你最近的，有水上救生员巡逻的海滩。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c9d3c59a1ccb2bc341a2fdc040b302e2_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c9d3c59a1ccb2bc341a2fdc040b302e2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c9d3c59a1ccb2bc341a2fdc040b302e2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-c9d3c59a1ccb2bc341a2fdc040b302e2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>来源：图片@surf Life Saving</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>2. 阅读与遵守相关安全指示标识，在下海前先检查天气与海浪情况，特别留意海水深度，如不清楚，请向水上救生员询问。<br/></p><p>3. 请勿独自一人下海，确保你的亲友家人知晓你回来的大致时间，以便于必要时求助。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>4. 请避免在饱餐、饮酒后，或受药物影响下入海。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-707d5a8e611e60644038802bd09c6071_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"647\" data-rawheight=\"648\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"647\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-707d5a8e611e60644038802bd09c6071_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;647&#39; height=&#39;648&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"647\" data-rawheight=\"648\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"647\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-707d5a8e611e60644038802bd09c6071_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-707d5a8e611e60644038802bd09c6071_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>来源：图片@SunSense, Invisible Zinc, Hamilton</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>5. 南澳的艳阳与干燥不可小觑，海滩游玩记得找一个有阴凉的地方，带上太阳帽、墨镜、长袖衬衫（或大方巾/披肩）与瓶装水，每两小时左右或下海后，别忘了涂抹指数30+以上的防水型防晒霜（Hamilton、EGO Sunsense、Invisible Zinc等品牌均不错）。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1edef4d460d72e9dc182e768e2cbf355_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"807\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1edef4d460d72e9dc182e768e2cbf355_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;807&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"807\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1edef4d460d72e9dc182e768e2cbf355_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-1edef4d460d72e9dc182e768e2cbf355_b.jpg\"/></figure><p><b>你觉得图中哪个区域更安全？</b></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>6. 学会如何找出并避开危险的“离岸流(Rip Current)”，一般而言，若你发现有一条狭长的区域相对风平浪静至外海，但颜色较深或浑浊，请留心，另外，离岸流最强的时候往往是退潮时分。</p><p><i><b>答案：A （B 为离岸流区域）</b></i></p><p>7. 若你在海中感到不适或遇险，请保持镇定，节省体力，尽量漂浮，伸出一只手挥舞求救。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-77e7cbdef30e6c5a723c62daf0d63113_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"641\" data-rawheight=\"646\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"641\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-77e7cbdef30e6c5a723c62daf0d63113_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;641&#39; height=&#39;646&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"641\" data-rawheight=\"646\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"641\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-77e7cbdef30e6c5a723c62daf0d63113_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-77e7cbdef30e6c5a723c62daf0d63113_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>来源：图片@wikiHow</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>8. 请尽量避开黎明与黄昏时分的潮湿沙土区，以免被蠓叮咬；请不要抓挠，可涂抹锌膏或芦荟啫喱在被叮咬的肌肤表面缓解瘙痒；如产生过敏，记得及时就医。<br/></p><p>9. 最后，请与我们一同保护这片原始的纯净，离开时请带走你的垃圾，留下一片美丽的海滩。</p><p><i>(资料来源：Surf Life Saving SA)</i></p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0be5f30b9fc7527a2819e24646aedf9_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0be5f30b9fc7527a2819e24646aedf9_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;675&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"675\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0be5f30b9fc7527a2819e24646aedf9_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-e0be5f30b9fc7527a2819e24646aedf9_b.jpg\"/></figure><p>来源：图片@摄图网</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f3887b24eebe40678c62abedc60d93f0_b.png\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1242\" data-rawheight=\"1114\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1242\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-f3887b24eebe40678c62abedc60d93f0_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; Brown/<a href=\"https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//www.xatt1.us\" class=\" external\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer\"><span class=\"invisible\">http://www.</span><span class=\"visible\">xatt1.us</span><span class=\"invisible\"></span></a>)</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1ab74d610c225740a0495b60d5770c0c_b.gif\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"522\" data-rawheight=\"312\" data-thumbnail=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1ab74d610c225740a0495b60d5770c0c_b.jpg\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"522\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-1ab74d610c225740a0495b60d5770c0c_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1080&#39; height=&#39;608&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1080\" data-rawheight=\"608\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1080\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-541676720d98dfd18f540f89d18572fc_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-541676720d98dfd18f540f89d18572fc_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>而当十二年后的今天，他再度回到曾经熟悉的南半球澳洲时，他也深深的感到日新月异并高速发展的中国与澳洲的巨大差别，从日常出行，消费，饮食到社会生活习惯和生活方式上的再度适应与调整， 都让他觉得自己有义务为中国的朋友和游客提供一些帮助，可以轻松友好地享受异国的旅游生活，这就是后来他一手创建的“游外”，第一个“全中文的旅游服务平台”的全部意义。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-e6afd83f0705ddda561345bed8dae613_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"244\" data-rawheight=\"244\" class=\"content_image\" width=\"244\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;512&#39; height=&#39;431&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"512\" data-rawheight=\"431\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"512\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-372a631c4758630f126254b91dbee7f2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-372a631c4758630f126254b91dbee7f2_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>只要使用「游外」小程序，查看南澳商家的限时优惠券，便可尽享美酒美食！</b>如市区顶尖西餐厅肖恩厨房(Sean’s kitchen)就提供任点一份海鲜拼盘，可获赠招牌红酒一杯的优惠，直省$10-20元澳元。</p><h2><b>No.7 景点自带“优惠”，你会利用吗？</b></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2a6e047937d655dfe2dcecd467801897_b.png\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1282\" data-rawheight=\"347\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1282\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2a6e047937d655dfe2dcecd467801897_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1282&#39; height=&#39;347&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1282\" data-rawheight=\"347\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1282\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2a6e047937d655dfe2dcecd467801897_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2a6e047937d655dfe2dcecd467801897_b.png\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>出门游玩，景点门票的开销可不小。好在，<b>绝大部分的南澳景点都提供“家庭票”，一些甚至提供“套票”（如动物园联票），</b>若带娃出游，可一定要记得买，省个几十元不在话下！</p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5e715e4121f9b7742217db722c0773c2_b.png\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5e715e4121f9b7742217db722c0773c2_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5e715e4121f9b7742217db722c0773c2_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-5e715e4121f9b7742217db722c0773c2_b.png\"/><figcaption>(Source@Adam Bruzzone/SATC)</figcaption></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f06b9816bbe98e32dcba63a5e018ef3f_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f06b9816bbe98e32dcba63a5e018ef3f_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f06b9816bbe98e32dcba63a5e018ef3f_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f06b9816bbe98e32dcba63a5e018ef3f_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>(Source@OzAsia Festival 2016)</figcaption></figure><p>南澳州更有不少景点与活动都是免费入场的（如南澳博物馆、澳亚艺术节中秋灯会），<b>只需关注“游外微信公众号”，便可获得最新最热门的本地活动资讯。</b></p><h2><b>No.8 自驾游如何更省钱？</b></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ef682b5cf68a037f55348a85210866d_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ef682b5cf68a037f55348a85210866d_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1024&#39; height=&#39;768&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1024\" data-rawheight=\"768\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1024\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ef682b5cf68a037f55348a85210866d_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-9ef682b5cf68a037f55348a85210866d_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>(Source@Paul Torcello/SATC)</figcaption></figure><p>南澳大利亚有着很多著名的自驾线路，如袋鼠岛、石灰岩海岸、芭萝莎谷等。但如何尽快熟悉中澳交规的不同，规避事故风险带来的额外金钱损失？</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-66a4310b1f8587b70ab02521b56a7891_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"719\" data-rawheight=\"424\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"719\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-66a4310b1f8587b70ab02521b56a7891_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;719&#39; height=&#39;424&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"719\" data-rawheight=\"424\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"719\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-66a4310b1f8587b70ab02521b56a7891_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-66a4310b1f8587b70ab02521b56a7891_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>「游外」为你准备了免费中文《南澳大利亚自驾手册》*，附带的租车小贴士与优惠券可帮助你省钱省事。</b></p><p>*纸质版可于南澳州境内的各大游客信息中心 (Visitor Information Centre)，多家酒店和阿德莱德机场的信息问询处 (Information Desk)领取；电子版索取请联络文末“游外小助手”。</p><h2><b>No.9 如何避免昂贵的医疗费用？</b></h2><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0d80eb410cef17f0bf27b7991665ac62_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0d80eb410cef17f0bf27b7991665ac62_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;1280&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"1280\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0d80eb410cef17f0bf27b7991665ac62_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-0d80eb410cef17f0bf27b7991665ac62_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>(Source@摄图网)</figcaption></figure><p>海外出游，常会水土不服，而意外事故更有可能会给你的身体健康与人身安全带来威胁。在澳洲生个病，昂贵的医疗费用往往会让你“直接傻掉”：单是全科医生问个诊，$70澳元就没了；而出动一辆救护车急诊，费用更逾千元澳币。</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4f740685e6c544d78806cff07dc08931_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2730\" data-rawheight=\"542\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"2730\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4f740685e6c544d78806cff07dc08931_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;2730&#39; height=&#39;542&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"2730\" data-rawheight=\"542\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"2730\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4f740685e6c544d78806cff07dc08931_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4f740685e6c544d78806cff07dc08931_b.jpg\"/></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p><b>但若你有一份Bupa、Medibank、Allianz等大公司的“海外游客健康保险(OVHC)”，每周$20-80澳元不等，自掏腰包的费用便可大大减少（最高可覆盖90%的医疗费用）*，让出行更心安。</b></p><p><i>*有适用条件，具体请参看保险公司网站。</i></p><h2><b>No.10 怎样购物能省更多？</b></h2><p>南澳没有国际奢侈大牌？但南澳更天然与居家必备的丰富“宝藏”却是相当值得“买买买”！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-be44cf03683d52ec7f31b57187aed27a_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"925\" data-rawheight=\"665\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"925\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-be44cf03683d52ec7f31b57187aed27a_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;925&#39; height=&#39;665&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"925\" data-rawheight=\"665\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"925\" data-original=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-be44cf03683d52ec7f31b57187aed27a_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-be44cf03683d52ec7f31b57187aed27a_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>(Source@Magill Estate/Jurlique/Haigh&amp;amp;amp;#39;s Chocolates/R.M.Williams)</figcaption></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>保健品与羊毛制品自不必说，<b>奔富窖藏美酒，有机护肤名品“茱莉蔻(Jurlique)”，纯手工皮革靴子R.M.Williams，巧克力中的极品“黑氏巧克力(Haigh&#39;s Chocolates)”</b>......想要买的东西更划算，去到原产地绝对没错！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-00852971a96d5e1b85b41ea428357e54_b.jpg\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"960\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-00852971a96d5e1b85b41ea428357e54_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39; width=&#39;1920&#39; height=&#39;960&#39;&gt;&lt;/svg&gt;\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1920\" data-rawheight=\"960\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb lazy\" width=\"1920\" data-original=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-00852971a96d5e1b85b41ea428357e54_r.jpg\" data-actualsrc=\"https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-00852971a96d5e1b85b41ea428357e54_b.jpg\"/><figcaption>(Source@摄图网)</figcaption></figure><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><p>此外，<b>圣诞新年（节礼日）、复活节、财政年中与10月时尚节都是打折季，若利用澳大利亚“游客退税计划(TRS)”，可以省下约10%！</b>想了解细节，快戳下面图片！</p><p class=\"ztext-empty-paragraph\"><br/></p><figure data-size=\"normal\"><noscript><img src=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d282e99a0b814673a1e9b6bbeb95fb59_b.jpg\" data-caption=\"\" data-size=\"normal\" data-rawwidth=\"1599\" data-rawheight=\"988\" class=\"origin_image zh-lightbox-thumb\" width=\"1599\" data-original=\"https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-d282e99a0b814673a1e9b6bbeb95fb59_r.jpg\"/></noscript><img src=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,&lt;svg xmlns=&#39;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#39;
